TopicTitle: When can I get Auto Ascent in MechJeb?

Articles.Content:
I have MechJeb #520 but Auto Ascent doesn't show up in the menu. Here is what I see:

http://imgur.com/ZrEfD5w  

At the bottom of the MechJeb menu it says that certain modules are disabled until I get some tech in the tech tree. Can someone please tell me which tech it is?

It goes like this:

Spoiler

CustomWindowEditor = flightControl
SmartASS = flightControl
ManeuverPlanner = advFlightControl
NodeEditor = advFlightControl
Translatron = advFlightControl
WarpHelper = advFlightControl
AttitudeAdjustment = advFlightControl
ThrustWindow = advFlightControl
RCSBalancerWindow = advFlightControl
RoverWindow = fieldScience
AscentGuidance = unmannedTech
LandingGuidance = unmannedTech
SpaceplaneGuidance = unmannedTech
DockingGuidance = advUnmanned
RendezvousAutopilotWindow = advUnmanned
RendezvousGuidance = advUnmanned
Is this career mode? If so, you've probably not unlocked it just yet...
